languages.text: Миссия Касбаллики преуспевала благодаря сокровищам, нажитым на сделках с Вольным Торговцем. Развернув широкие рынки сбыта, обзаведясь армией наемников и флотом, организация готова была оспорить незаконность своей деятельности перед лицом властей. Те, кому хватало глупости вступить в сей спор, умирали быстро, страшно и необъяснимо.

The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.
languages.original_text: Миссия Касбаллики преуспевала благодаря сокровищам, нажитым на сделках с Вольным Торговцем. Развернув широкие рынки сбыта, обзаведясь армией наемников и флотом, организация готова была оспорить незаконность своей деятельности перед лицом властей. Те, кому хватало глупости вступить в сей спор, умирали быстро, страшно и необъяснимо.

traits.locale_text: Kasballica Mission was prospering thanks to the riches it accrued on the deals with the Rogue Trader. Expanding its sales markets, and setting up a mercenary army and a fleet of ships, the organisation was in the position to dispute the illegitimacy of its business in the face of the authorities. Those, who were foolish enough to engage in this dispute, died a fast, dreadful and inexplicable death.

Those, who were foolish enough to engage in this dispute, died a fast, dreadful and inexplicable death.

The Kasballica Mission prospered thanks to its business with the Rogue Trader. The organisation had expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, dreadful, and inexplicable deaths.

Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, dreadful, and inexplicable deaths.

Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. languages.text: 卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团越发繁荣，这一切都得益于行商浪人带来的利润与财富。犯罪集团拓展了新的市场，还建立了自己的舰队，雇佣了一支雇佣兵军队，准备向帝国当局捍卫生意的合法性。至于那些愚蠢到胆敢挑战他们权利的人，很快就会迎来神秘而凄惨的死亡。
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

traits.locale_text: 卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团越发繁荣，这一切都得益于它与行商浪人之间的贸易。犯罪集团拓展了新的市场，还建立了自己的舰队，雇佣了一支雇佣兵军队，准备向帝国当局捍卫生意的合法性。至于那些愚蠢到胆敢否认他们权利的人，很快就会迎来神秘而凄惨的死亡。

languages.text: Die Kasballica-Mission florierte dank der Reichtümer, die sie durch ihre Geschäfte mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} anhäufte. Die Organisation hatte in neue Märkte expandiert, eine Söldnerarmee und -flotte aufgebaut, und war bereit, die Legitimität ihrer Geschäfte vor den Behörden zu verteidigen. Wer töricht genug war, ihr dieses Recht zu verwehren, der starb einen schnellen, brutalen und nie aufgeklärten Tod.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

traits.locale_text: Die Kasballica-Mission florierte dank ihrer Geschäfte mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}. Die Organisation hatte in neue Märkte expandiert, eine Söldnerarmee und -flotte aufgebaut, und war bereit, die Legitimität ihrer Geschäfte vor den Behörden zu verteidigen. Wer töricht genug war, ihr dieses Recht zu verwehren, der starb einen schnellen, grauenhaften und unerklärlichen Tod.

languages.text: La mission de la Kasballica prospéra grâce aux bénéfices tirés de ses relations commerciales avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. L'organisation s'était étendue à de nouveaux marchés, avait constitué une armée et une flotte de mercenaires, et se tenait prête à défendre la légitimité de ses activités devant les autorités. Ceux qui se montrèrent assez stupides pour leur refuser ce droit périrent très vite, dans des circonstances aussi brutales qu'inexplicables.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

traits.locale_text: La mission de la Kasballica prospéra grâce à ses relations commerciales avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. L'organisation s'était étendue à de nouveaux marchés, avait constitué une armée et une flotte de mercenaires, et se tenait prête à défendre la légitimité de ses activités devant les autorités. Ceux qui se montrèrent assez stupides pour leur refuser ce droit périrent très vite, dans des circonstances aussi horribles qu'inexplicables.

languages.text: La misión Kasballica prosperó gracias a las riquezas que le proporcionaron sus negocios con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. La organización se había expandido a nuevos mercados, había creado un ejército y flota de mercenarios y estaba lista para defender la legitimidad de sus actividades frente a las autoridades. Los necios que trataban de negarla sufrían muertes rápidas, atroces e inexplicables.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

traits.locale_text: La misión Kasballica prosperó gracias a sus negocios con el Comerciante Independiente. La organización se había expandido a nuevos mercados, había creado un ejército y flota de mercenarios y estaba lista para defender la legitimidad de sus actividades frente a las autoridades. Los necios que trataban de negarla sufrían muertes rápidas, atroces e inexplicables.

languages.text: カスバリカ聖務団は自由開拓者との取引で得た富で繁栄した。組織は新しい市場に進出し、傭兵部隊と艦隊を増強し、当局から事業の正当性を守る態勢を整えていた。その正当性を否定する愚かな者たちは、瞬く間に残忍かつ不可解な死を遂げた。
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

traits.locale_text: カスバリカ聖務団は自由開拓者との取引で得た富で繁栄した。組織は新しい市場に進出し、傭兵部隊と艦隊を増強し、当局から事業の正当性を守る態勢を整えていた。その正当性を否定する愚かな者たちは、瞬く間に残忍かつ不可解な死を遂げた。

languages.text: Kasballica Misyonu, Hür Tacir ile yaptığı anlaşmalar sayesinde epey bir zengin oldu. Yeni pazarlara açılan organizasyon, paralı asker ordusu ve filosu kurup yaptığı işin yasallığını yetkililere karşı savunmaya hazır hâle geldi. Bu hakkı ondan almaya çalışacak kadar akılsız olanlar; çok geçmeden, açıklanamayan sebeplerle ve vahşice şekillerde hayatlarını kaybetti.
languages.original_text: The Kasballica Mission thrived on the riches it acquired in its deals with the Rogue Trader. The organisation expanded to new markets, built up a mercenary army and fleet, and was ready to defend the legitimacy of its business from the authorities. Those foolish enough to deny it that right died quick, brutal, and unexplained deaths.

traits.locale_text: Kasballica Misyonu, Hür Tacir ile yaptığı anlaşmalar sayesinde zenginliğe boğuldu. Organizasyon yeni pazarlara genişledi, bir paralı asker ordusu ve filosu kurdu ve de yaptığı işin yasallığını, yetkililere karşı savunmaya hazır hâle geldi. Bu hakkı ondan almaya çalışacak kadar akılsız olanlar çok geçmeden, açıklanamayan sebeplerle, vahşice şekillerde hayatlarını kaybettiler.
